message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $75 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $82.50.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $80 for the product.
